product_overview: Student Flow PM is a next-generation project management platform tailored specifically for students. It offers AI-powered assistance, context-aware management, and data-driven insights designed to streamline academic project workflows, eliminate administrative burdens, and enhance productivity.
core_goals: Eliminate friction through AI-assisted project setup and task generation
Provide context-aware management with academic context understanding
Deliver data-driven insights with automated analytics and visual progress tracking
Design an intuitive user experience optimized for student needs
key_features: User authentication with registration, login, password recovery, and profile management
Multi-step project creation wizard with AI task and timeline suggestions
Comprehensive project dashboard showing progress, active projects, and quick actions
Kanban-style task management with drag-and-drop, status updates, and detailed views
AI-powered features including smart task generation, document analysis, and progress insights
Project calendar with multi-project views and deadline management
Resource management with file uploads, link management, and organization
Real-time project messaging and collaboration with file sharing and mentions
User notifications system with customizable settings and activity feed
Data insights and analytics presenting project and personal productivity metrics
Collaborative project spaces for team projects with shared resources and communication
user_flow_summary: Creating a new project: from dashboard initiation to AI-powered task and milestone suggestions and final project creation
AI document analysis flow enabling users to upload academic documents to extract key points and auto-generate project tasks
Calendar task management allowing users to view, add, reschedule, and edit tasks within a visual calendar interface
validation_criteria: User registration, login, and password recovery workflows function securely and reliably
Project creation wizard completes multi-step project setup with AI suggestions accepted by users
Kanban board supports task CRUD, drag-and-drop reordering, and status updates without errors
AI features accurately analyze documents and generate meaningful task suggestions
Calendar displays all relevant tasks and deadlines with color coding and supports quick task additions
Resource uploads and linking features store and retrieve project files efficiently
Messaging system enables real-time collaboration with thread and mention support
Notifications deliver timely alerts with user preferences respected
Data insights reflect accurate progress and productivity metrics
Application meets performance standards including <2 second dashboard load time and <500ms API response
